structure.unit: STATE AND FEDERAL HIGHWAYS -- LIMITED ACCESS FACILITIES -- TURNPIKES -- ROAD BONDS -- BILLBOARDS -- RECYCLERS

law.catch_line: Transportation and Tourism Interagency Committee -- Purpose.
law.text: The Transportation and Tourism Interagency Committee is established to foster close collaboration between the Tourism, Arts and Heritage Cabinet and the Transportation Cabinet on policies that affect the tourism industry and to place strong emphasis on the coordination of mutual interests such as highway signage, scenic byways, highway safety, and concern for the Commonwealth's beauty and heritage.
law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 16, sec. 54, effective June 25, 2009. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 40, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 334, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1998.
